name: Chris Frey
quote: As a writer and photographer, Lionel was a key contributor to Outpost Magazine - around the time we won Magazine of the Year. Lionel was critical in helping us develop an overall online strategy and site architecture.
role: Founder Outpost, now at No Media Co.

name: Michael Budd
quote: Lionel is goal-oriented and adds value to multi-faceted team-based projects. He works well with team members and in identifying and capitalizing upon their strengths and developing their weaknesses.
role: Director, Advisor Digital Activation Strategy, RBC

name: Natalia Kantor
quote: Lionel was responsible for development of a complex site for Planet in Focus, Canada's largest Environmental Film Festival. He is a reliable, accessible and inventive programmer with amazing problem solving skills.

name: Cathy Moore
quote: A great online strategist, Lionel is passionate about emerging trends and continually brings new ideas to the table. He is a creative designer, an exceptional team player, and a great coach and teacher.

name: Steve Hurtado
quote: He was technically proficient, knowledgeable about what the product could and could not do, a good communicator, and was always professional and fun to work with. He would be an asset to any organization.

name: Chris Frey
quote: If Lionel were a car mechanic, he'd be as happy under the hood, tooling with the engine, as he would be obsessed with design detailing. He is a resourceful problem solver who is constantly pushing his skills.
role: Founder Outpost, now at No Media Co.

name: Rodney Ronquillo
quote: Lionel is a skilled and detail-oriented professional, demonstrating exceptional leadership qualities. Constantly seeking avenues to enhance his contributions to the organization and colleagues.

name: Cathy Moore
quote: In his time at CCS, Lionel developed a track record of researching and presenting ideas that were understandable, actionable and measurable, and successfully managing those resulting projects.

name: Rachna Sharma
quote: Collaborating with Lionel on various projects, including a pilot project at the Cancer Society, was truly enjoyable. His technical proficiency and keen attention to detail make him a valuable asset to the team!

name: Catherine Allman
quote: Lionel combined creativity and reliability to produce an excellent online, on-time presence for the Canadian Cancer Society.
